message.subject: Answers
message.content:
M1.1. ignore the note below to dan--it does not to apply to you! [Y]
[Request-Action: do not read note below, because it only applies to Dan]
Flink1.1
M1.2. scan pretty far
down for answers.
[Inform-AnswerOffline: Darron should scan down the note for answers to questions presumably asked offline]
M1.3. glad we got to see carlos this weekend.
[Inform: Karen is glad to have seen Carlos over the weekend]
M1.4. have a good week
[Conventional: have a good week]
M1.5. karen
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: Answers
message.content:
M2.1. Tell Dan that a glacier moves forward, not backward. [Y]
[Inform: Karen should tell Dan that glaciers only move forward, not backwards]
M2.2. On a balk, the batter
does not advance, only the baserunners.
[Inform: explanation of a baseball term]
M2.3. But he may have a point with cricket.
[Inform: Dan might be right about something he said about cricket]
M2.4. DG
[Conventional: signature]
